name: Leather Journal
brief_description: Hand-crafted leather journal for notes and sketches
full_description: A beautiful hand-crafted leather journal with 200 pages of acid-free paper. Perfect for writers, artists, or anyone who appreciates fine craftsmanship. Features a wrap-around cover with a leather cord closure.

name: Woodworking Kit
brief_description: Beginner woodworking tool set with quality tools
full_description: Complete starter kit for woodworking enthusiasts. Includes chisels, mallet, marking gauge, and instructional guide. Made with quality hardwood handles and steel blades.

name: Vinyl Record Player
full_description: Classic vinyl record player combining vintage aesthetics with modern technology. Features built-in speakers, Bluetooth connectivity, and USB recording capability. Plays 33, 45, and 78 RPM records.

name: Gourmet Coffee Subscription
brief_description: Monthly delivery of artisan coffee beans
full_description: Premium coffee subscription featuring single-origin beans from around the world. Each month receive 12oz of freshly roasted coffee with tasting notes and brewing tips. Choose from light, medium, or dark roasts.

name: Indoor Herb Garden Kit
brief_description: Grow fresh herbs year-round with LED lighting
full_description: Self-watering indoor garden with LED grow lights. Includes seeds for basil, mint, parsley, and cilantro. Perfect for small spaces - fits on any countertop. Grows herbs 5x faster than soil.

name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
full_description: High-fidelity wireless headphones with active noise cancellation. Features 30-hour battery life, comfortable memory foam ear cups, and multipoint Bluetooth connection for seamless device switching.

name: Artisan Chocolate Box
full_description: Exquisite collection of 24 hand-crafted chocolate truffles. Flavors include dark chocolate sea salt, champagne, raspberry, and espresso. Beautifully packaged in a keepsake wooden box.

name: Portable Espresso Maker
full_description: Compact manual espresso maker that works without electricity. Perfect for camping, travel, or office use. Compatible with ground coffee and Nespresso pods. Produces 15-18 bars of pressure.

name: Cashmere Scarf
full_description: Premium cashmere scarf in classic herringbone pattern. Incredibly soft and warm, yet lightweight. Measures 70x12 inches. Available in multiple colors. Ethically sourced from Mongolia.

name: Smart Indoor Garden
full_description: Advanced hydroponic garden with app-controlled lighting and watering. Grows up to 12 plants simultaneously. Includes seed pods for tomatoes, lettuce, and herbs. Perfect for year-round gardening.

name: Padres Tickets
brief_description: Tickets to a San Diego Padres game
full_description: San Diego Padres tickets at Petco park. They will never win the World Series, but at least the weather will be nice!

name: Kindle Paperwhite
brief_description: Waterproof e-reader with weeks of battery life
full_description: The latest Kindle Paperwhite features a 6.8-inch display, adjustable warm light, and up to 10 weeks of battery life. Waterproof design for reading by the pool or in the bath.

name: Yeti Rambler Tumbler
full_description: 30oz vacuum-insulated tumbler keeps drinks hot or cold for hours. Durable stainless steel with MagSlider lid. Dishwasher safe.

name: Nintendo Switch
brief_description: Versatile gaming console for home and travel
full_description: Hybrid gaming console that works on TV or as a portable device. Play solo or multiplayer games anywhere. Includes two Joy-Con controllers.

name: Dyson Airwrap
brief_description: Multi-styler for curls, waves, and smooth blowouts
full_description: Revolutionary hair styler that uses air to curl, wave, smooth, and dry hair. Includes multiple attachments for different styles. Engineered for all hair types.

name: Le Creuset Dutch Oven
full_description: Iconic 5.5-quart Dutch oven perfect for slow-cooking, braising, and baking. Even heat distribution with superior heat retention. Lifetime warranty.

name: Sonos One Speaker
full_description: Compact smart speaker with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant built-in. Rich, room-filling sound. Pair two for stereo separation.

name: Theragun Mini
full_description: Ultra-quiet portable massage gun for muscle relief on the go. Three speed settings, 150-minute battery life. Perfect for post-workout recovery.

name: Apple AirPods Pro
brief_description: Premium wireless earbuds with noise cancellation

name: Brooklinen Linen Sheets
full_description: 100% Belgian flax linen sheets that get softer with every wash. Temperature regulating and moisture-wicking. Available in multiple colors.

name: MasterClass Annual Subscription
full_description: Unlimited access to classes taught by celebrities and experts in cooking, writing, music, and more. Over 180 classes available.

name: Oura Ring
full_description: Tracks sleep, activity, and readiness with incredible accuracy. Sleek titanium design. 7-day battery life.

name: Stanley Quencher
